headline: Motorola Solutions (MSI) Margin Gains Reinforce Bullish Narrative Despite Slower Growth Versus Market
summary: Motorola Solutions (MSI) posted standout earnings growth of 35.6%, significantly outpacing its 5-year average of 15.1% per year. Profit margins climbed to 18.7% from last year's 14.7%, and while earnings and revenue are forecast to rise at 9.09% and 6.8% per year respectively, both figures trail the broader US market averages. For investors, the improving margins and steady growth profile make the latest results look constructive, especially with shares trading below analyst price targets and...
